hindi_meaning: havana ke samaya Gqwa Axi kI Ahuwi se prajvaliwa agni ke samAna praxIpwa/camakawe hue
samAsa: huwaScAsO huwASanaH iwi huwahuwASanaH,huwahuwASanasya xIpwiriva xIpwiH yasya waw huwahuwASanaxIpwi

hindi_meaning: (xala-kesara-peSala)sukumAra evaM sunxara paMKadI va parAga vAle
samAsa: xalAni ca kesarANi ca weRu xalakesareRu peSalamiwi xalakesarapeSalam, waw
